alert.note: Alert for Coastal Levy; Inland Levy (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Levy County through 730 PM EDT... At 659 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Chiefland to 11 miles southwest of Williston Highlands. Movement was northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Otter Creek and Lebanon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
